message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.AR, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper discusses the application of FloatSD technology to train LSTM models, which is a popular machine learning technique.
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper specifically focuses on the application of FloatSD to RNNs, which are a type of neural network.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper discusses the use of a novel training scheme to improve the performance of LSTM models, which is relevant to the field of AI.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper also discusses the implementation of an LSTM neuron circuit, which is relevant to the field of hardware architecture.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the reduction of die area and power consumption in the implementation of the LSTM neuron circuit, which is relevant to the field of systems and control.
